## Committee Members

We're currently looking for new committee members! Roles are flexible depending on your time constraints, and are only during term time. If you're interested please contact us at <a href= "mailto: sciml@leeds.ac.uk"> sciml@leeds.ac.uk </a> for more infomation, or chat to any of the committee at events!
